'''1.7.10 Build 12'''<ref name="blog2">{{citation |url=https://mcedudev.tumblr.com/post/105600953934/1710-build-12-stable|title=1.7.10 build 12 Stable! |date=December 19, 2014 |website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref> is the twelfth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on December 19, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]]. This is the first hosting version and final build in 2014.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Ability to login with MinecraftEdu hosting account and connect to your Hosting servers.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Bats not appearing even when animals were enabled.
* World name showing as "null" in server window if started a world from the World Library.
* Possible fix for some intel graphics cards not being able to run MinecraftEdu at all (1280 GL ERROR).
